{{Disambig-more|Beleg|[[Beleg (disambiguation)]]}}'''''beleg''''' is a [[Sindarin]] word meaning "mighty",<ref>{{S|Appendix}}, entry ''beleg''</ref> or "great, large".<ref>{{PE|Eldarin}}, p. 115</ref> It is applied as a proper name to the character [[Beleg|'''Beleg''' Cúthalion]] and [[Beleg (King of Arthedain)|'''Beleg''' (King of Arthedain)]].

==Examples==
*''[[Belegaer|'''Beleg'''aer]]'' = "Great Sea"
*''[[Belegost|'''Beleg'''ost]]'' = "Great Fortress"
*''[[Belegûr|'''Beleg'''ur]]'' = "He who arises in Might"
*''[[Cûl Veleg|Cûl '''Veleg''']]'' = "Bigload"
*''[[Laer Cú Beleg|Laer Cú '''Beleg''']]'' = "Song of the Great Bow"
